content.question: In the seventh sentence of the seventh paragraph, the author uses a dash primarily to

choices.label: separate a secondary idea from the main thrust of her argument
distinguish her own claim from a claim she aims to refute
contrast her definition of a term with the termâ€™s ordinary meaning
elaborate on a general claim by providing specific examples

content.answer: elaborate on a general claim by providing specific examples

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
